org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class StateListModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<java.lang.Object>
      • org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.StateListModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<java.lang.Object>, SetListener<State>

    public class StateListModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel<java.lang.Object>
implements SetListener<State>
    A StateListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of states. The states in this model are sorted ascendantly by their IDs.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
